channel.title: Topic 05: Convolution Neural Networks on Introduction to Machine Learning (I2ML)
channel.description: Recent content in Topic 05: Convolution Neural Networks on Introduction to Machine Learning (I2ML)

item.title: Chapter 05.01: Introduction of Convolution Neural Networks (CNNs)
item.description: In this part, we introduce the CNNs and when we can apply CNNs instead of FCN.

item.title: Chapter 05.02: Convolutional Operation
item.description: We learn about filters and convolution operation in this section.

item.title: Chapter 05.03: Properties of Convolution
item.description: We introduce three important properties by CNNs.

item.title: Chapter 05.04: CNN Components
item.description: We explain input channel, padding, stride, and pooling as CNN component.

item.title: Chapter 05.05: CNN Application
item.description: We overview some successful application of CNN in visual recognition.

item.title: Chapter 05.06: Convolutions- Mathematical Perspective
item.description: We explain the differences between convolution operation and cross-correlation.
